name: Vidal Mayor
maker: Unknown, Vidal de Canellas, and probably Michael Lupi de Çandiu, et al
description: Vidal Mayor; Unknown, Vidal de Canellas (Spanish, active Aragon, Spain 1236 - 1252), and probably Michael Lupi de Çandiu (Spanish, active Pamplona, Spain 1297 - 1305), et al; Northeastern Spain, Spain; about 1290 - 1310; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with modern green morocco; Leaf: 36.5 × 24 cm (14 3/8 × 9 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 6; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with modern green morocco
